question: India and the US are going to hold 2+2 Ministerial Dialogue in Washington. India holds similar dialogue format with which other country?
explanation: Japan and the US are the only two countries with which India is currently holding 2+2 Ministerial dialogue. It is held between the countriesâ€™ foreign and defence ministers. This year, Japan and India held its first ever 2+2 Ministerial Dialogue.
